text: Many men with only limited accommodation have to do their woodwork on the kitchen table. Providing this is sound, some perfectly good work can be done on it, but the usual problems are those of the vice, the bench stop, and storage place for tools. The combined bench top and tool cupboard shown here has been specially designed and made for WOODWORKER readers who have this difficulty.
